thread.title: Hemant Kaushal
thread.title_full: Atheneum Partners bewertet von Hemant Kaushal

author: Hemant Kaushal
title: Hemant Kaushal
text: I have been working with Atheneum Partners for quite sometime and I rate their services top class. They are very methodical, give appropriate opportunities matching one's experience and payments are also made timely. In short, it is a great company to work for!
